$:/plugins/tiddlywiki/codemirror/addon/m.title: $:/plugins/tiddlywiki/codemirror/addon/mode/multiplex.js

$:/plugins/tiddlywiki/codemirror/mode/ht.title: $:/plugins/tiddlywiki/codemirror/mode/htmlembedded/htmlembedded.js

$:/plugins/tiddlywiki/codemirror-mode-ht.title: $:/plugins/tiddlywiki/codemirror-mode-htmlembedded/readme
$:/plugins/tiddlywiki/codemirror-mode-ht.text: This plugin adds Syntax Highlighting for Embedded-HTML tiddlers (application/x-aspx, application/x-ejs, application/x-jsp and application/x-erb) to the [[CodeMirror|http://codemirror.net]] text editor. It needs the latest [[CodeMirror plugin|$:/plugins/tiddlywiki/codemirror]] to be installed
